passages.text:
You just woke up at camp. Get up and start your adventure!
Select the type of transportation you would like to use to go into Town 

[[Horse->Horse]]
[[Wagon->Wagon]]
[[On Foot->Foot]]
passages.name: Base Camp

passages.text:
You have made it into Town on your Horse
What would you like to do now!

[[Go to Mae's Tavern->Tavern]]
[[Go to the Gun Shop->Gun Shop]]
[[Go to the Trading Post->Trade]]
passages.name: Horse

passages.text:
Oh NO! A wheel fell off your wagon. What would you like to do now?
Fix the Wagon Wheel with your tools on hand or Head back to camp and take another way of transportation.

[[Fix the Wagon wheel->Fix]]
[[Head to Camp->Base Camp]]
passages.name: Wagon

passages.text:
Oh NO! You have ran into a pack of wolves but they have not spotted you yet. What do you want to do?
Try to shoot at the wolves and take them out or try to hide until they pass?

[[Shoot->Shoot]]
[[Hide->Hide]]
passages.name: Foot

passages.text:
Mrs. Mae was happy to see you. Mae has given you multiple food resources to bring back to Camp!
What would you like to do now?

[[Head back to Camp->Base Camp]] 
[[Go to the Gun Shop->Gun Shop]]
[[Go to the Trading Post->Trade]]
passages.name: Tavern

passages.text:
You have made it to the gun Shop. You have decided to purchase a gun. On your way out One-Eyed Rick challenges you to a duel.
Do you want to duel One-Eyed Rick or do you want to walk away from the situation? 

[[Duel->Duel]]
[[Walk Away->Walk Away]]
passages.name: Gun Shop

passages.text:
You are now at the Trading Post. You have some animal pelts from hunting yesterday.
Would you like to sell the pelts for profit or would you rather keep the pelts for later use?

[[Sell->Sell]]
[[Keep->Keep]]
passages.name: Trade

passages.text:
Congradulations! You fixed the wheel and made it to town. 
Where would you like to go now?

[[Go to Mae's Tavern->Tavern]]
[[Go to the Gun Shop->Gun Shop]]
[[Go to the Trading Post->Trade]]
passages.name: Fix

passages.text:
Sadly there were too many Wolves for you to handle and you couldn't defend yourself.
Please restart back at Camp

[[Restart->Base Camp]]
passages.name: Shoot

passages.text:
Congradulations! The pack of Wolves did not find you hiding.
You've made it to Town! What would you like to do now?

[[Go to Mae's Tavern->Tavern]]
[[Go to the Gun Shop->Gun Shop]]
[[Go to the Trading Post->Trade]]
passages.name: Hide

passages.text:
Congradulations! You have sold the animal pelts for a nice profit.
Where would you like to go now?

[[Go to Mae's Tavern->Tavern]]
[[Go to the Gun Shop->Gun Shop]]
[[Head back to Camp->Base Camp]]
passages.name: Sell

passages.text:
You decided to keep the animal pelts for later use.
Where would you like to go now?

[[Go to Mae's Tavern->Tavern]]
[[Go to the Gun Shop->Gun Shop]]
[[Head back to Camp->Base Camp]]
passages.name: Keep

passages.text:
Congradulations! You defeated One-Eyed Rick in the duel and gained honor in the town!
Where would you like to go now?

[[Go to Mae's Tavern->Tavern]]
[[Go to the Trading Post->Trade]]
[[Head back to Camp->Base Camp]]
passages.name: Duel

passages.text:
Sadly One-Eyed Rick was mad that you walked away and shot you in the back!
Please Restart back at Camp

[[Restart->Base Camp]]
passages.name: Walk Away
